name: Mother Bear
description:
I challenged myself to make a game in a month.

This is that game. 

UPDATE: Files are fixed! Game now works!

UPDATE 2: All files are now included. Simply redownload the new file if you still have the old one

_______________________________

CONTROLS:

<> or WASD to move

Space to pick up or read an object

WHILE PICKING UP: Hold r and move mouse to rotate.

WHILE PICKING UP: Left-click to zoom

_______________________________

Fonts Used: 

Good Times 

nerve-tonic

Octin Prison

Pecita 

Swistblank Moabhores

Libel Suit
